fr.iutvalence.java.projet.spaceinvaders
Class BoundingBox

java.lang.Object
  fr.iutvalence.java.projet.spaceinvaders.BoundingBox

public class BoundingBox
extends java.lang.Object

The BoundingBox class define area.
An area is defined by position (Coordinates) and size (Coordinates) on the grid. The coordinates have to be positive or equals to 0 otherwise it returns NegativeCoordinates exception The 0 point is bottom left, the grid is represented like this :

Y
^
|
|
|
| (x1,y2)________(x2,y2)
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| (x1,y1)________(x2,y1)
|
|
0---------------------------------> X

Author:
Gallet Guyon

Constructor Detail

BoundingBox

public BoundingBox(Coordinates position,
                   Coordinates size)
            throws NegativeSizeException
Creates a new bounding box, whose position and size are given as parameters

Parameters:
position - Set the position of the element in 2D grid
size - Can't be change once it's allocated
Throws:
NegativeSizeException - If size has at least one negative coordinate.

Returns:

translate

public BoundingBox translate(Coordinates delta)
                      throws NegativeSizeException
Method to translate position of the bottom-left corner of the bounding box

Parameters:
delta - (Coordinates) take the old coordinates and add delta to it.
Returns:
New BoundingBox with new coordinates.
Throws:
NegativeSizeException - If position is negative.

pointIn

public boolean pointIn(Coordinates point)
Method to check if a point is contained in this bounding box.

Parameters:
point - Coordinates of the point to check.
Returns:
true if the point is in the area, false otherwise.

intersection

public BoundingBox intersection(BoundingBox bb)
Intersection of the current bounding box and another

Parameters:
bb - Bounding box to calculate intersection with.
Returns:
Return the bounding box resulting of this one and bb intersection if it exists, null otherwise.
